name: places/ChIJQW9L96tZwokRusdcGVHenyI
formattedAddress: 132 W 36th St. 3rd floor, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 132 W 36th St. 3rd floor, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text:
The representative, Ethan, told my boss in front of us that we could cancel Any time. When the boss decided to cancel, he was informed he was locked in to a 4 year contract. These people lied to us and are scam artists. The amount of money they charge to customers is higher than what square charges the business. If customers are paying the processing fee, there is no justification for charging an additional fee.

Do not buy from them. We regret doing so. Clients also tip less because they are charged so much.

Upon trying to resolve the issue, they have refused to contact the owner, hung up on him, and treated him with extreme disrespect.

Calls to them are blocked and ignored, instead of being dealt with professionally. Do yourself a favour and stay away from them.

Also, at the time of writing this, the real tree company and Brooke c who gave them 5 stars and attack those who say otherwise, if you look at their profiles they only have 1 review each- for red payments. This is highly suspicious, and leads me to believe they are not in fact real people, but just fakes trying to do damage control for the company.

originalText.text: I used to work for them I was moved into a manager position just to be removed as manager cause head managers girlfriend needed a job and didn't want to work the phones, also company misfiled my tax information dyajn I claimed 9 kids when I claimed 0 for a reason and don't 9 at all .. I'm still fighting irs

originalText.text:
PLEASE READ YOUR CONTRACT WHEN SIGNING UP WITH THIS MERCHANT SERVICE!!!

when the sales agent that came to my store signed me up with red payments. i was told my monthly credit card terminal lease fee is $10 a month. When i read the contract they charged me $50 a month and $20 a month for pin pad. i was robbed for a basic credit card terminal for 48 months. in total i was charged $3,360.00 for the terminal lease.

FIND another trusted merchant service.
this company is absolutely stealing from hard working people.

originalText.text: Imagine, you started a business and are looking for a company that can give small card fees and are safe, trusted and polite. Upon agreeing with a salesperson, you believe all is well until you see the first charge on your account. Now you want to cancel, except the company will not allow it. They present a cancellation fee and give no room for agreement. The company is rude, and completely fraudulent. You realize you made a deal with the devil, except this is worse. This is red payments, a company that has no issue scamming it’s costumers yet CONTINUES to operate. The company faces dozens of law suits and continues to drain individuals money. Never sign a contract with them, don’t contact them, and do NOT provide them with costumers. Let’s watch this company wither and die due to their greediness and pure unfairness.

originalText.text: Got scammed into the contract with misleading information. The sales rep was actually had a pending court case for scamming old people.lol So I paid the fees and never processed a payment for 3 years. Now after my 3 year term I have called to cancel 3 days in a row and no one from red payments retention team will get on the phone with me but there agents tell me that's who has to handle my cancellation. They have promised to return my call every day and so far nothing.
